short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows VideoRequest users one-click access to their account, recording videos and recording their desktop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension starts by having you sign-in to VideoRequest.  Once you are signed-in, you can chose from your projects and easily add new videos.
